title: Gold players on average worse than Bronze players.

replies.body:
Nah they seriously are.

1. Tryhards.
2. Throw artists.
3. Sooks.
4. Infighting.
5. Throws.
6. People comfortable with being Gold for life.
7. Big playmakers a.k.a epic failures.
8. 5 Captains per team.
9. Show-offs.
10. Tilters.
11. Afkers/laggers/alt-tabbers.
Lol what evidence do you have to prove this? I mean, stating a thesis point isn't enough.
...You just listed characteristics common in bronze, be it replace 6 with feeling the need to be gold.
You mean they feel they belong in Challenger and LCS.
